text: This Chinese reading describes Mr Brown’s life, and his garden.It uses the word 种 to mean “to plant”. It needs to be pronounced with the 4th tone.布朗先生住在一个漂亮的房子里。从周一到周五，他在自己家附近的一间办公室里工作。周末的时候，他不需要工作。他还有一个漂亮的花园，他会在花园里种些植物。他很享受在花园里忙碌的时光，那是他最开心的时候。Mr. Brown lives in a beautiful house. From Monday to Friday, he works in an office near his home. He doesn’t need to work on weekends.He also has a beautiful garden where he will plant plants. He enjoys being busy in his garden, that is when he is happiest.1 – 布朗先生在哪里工作？a. 他在火车站工作。b. 他在动物园工作。c. 他在办公室工作。d. 他退休了。1. cReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
